page.title: 08FARMING 3 KING'S FRUIT FM.
page.content: One of the farms in Ford End is a {fruit farm}belonging to Mr. Marvin. A group of us went to talk to him and he showed us round. He has orchards of apple and pear trees and he also grows soft fruit- strawberries, raspberries, black- currants, red currants, and goose- berries. He has a shop at the farm but most of his fruit is sent away to shops and markets. He has a cold store to keep the fruit fresh. People can go and pick their own soft fruit. On July 10th. 1985,they cost 40p for strawberries, 52p for raspberries and 25p for gooseberries.
